```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
library(ggwordcloud)
```

## Read in the survey data
```{r}
survey_data <- read_excel(here("data", "Crowdsourcing Rules for Data Communication and Translation(1-6).xlsx")) |> janitor::clean_names()

colnames(survey_data)
```

# Explore word cloud
```{r}
ggplot(survey_data, aes(label = what_technical_tools_do_you_use_for_data_communication)) +
  geom_text_wordcloud() +
  theme_minimal()
```
